'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional
'The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.': Functional
'The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.': Functional
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Availability
'The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode': Functional
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Operational
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Look and Feel
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security

'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional

'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional

'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Operational
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Look and Feel
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
The product shall be internet browser independent.The product must run using Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.': Maintainability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional
'The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player': Security
'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.': Functional
'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Availability
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Operational
'The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year.': Availability
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.': Functional
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional
'The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.': Functional
'The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.': Functional
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Availability
'The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode': Functional
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'User access should be limited to the permissions granted to their role(s) Each level in the PCG hierarchy will be assigned a role and users will be assigned to these roles. Access to functionality within RFS system is dependent on the privileges/permission assigned to the role..'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability

'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Availability
'The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode': Functional
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be expected to manage the nursing program curriculum and class/clinical scheduling for a minimum of 5 years.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Operational
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Look and Feel
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
The product shall be internet browser independent.The product must run using Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.': Maintainability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional
'The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player': Security
'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.': Functional
'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Availability
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Operational
'The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year.': Availability
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.': Functional
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional

'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Look and Feel
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
The product shall be internet browser independent.The product must run using Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.': Maintainability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional
'The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player': Security
'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.': Functional
'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Availability
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Operational
'The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year.': Availability
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.': Functional
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional
'The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.': Functional
'The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.': Functional
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Availability
'The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode': Functional
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The recycled parts audit report shall be returned to the user within 10 seconds. The audit report shall be returned within 10 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability

'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Operational
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Look and Feel
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
The product shall be internet browser independent.The product must run using Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.': Maintainability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional
'The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player': Security
'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.': Functional
'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Availability
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Operational
'The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year.': Availability
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.': Functional
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional
'The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.': Functional
'The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.': Functional
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional

'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional
'The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player': Security
'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.': Functional
'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Availability
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Operational
'The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year.': Availability
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.': Functional
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional
'The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.': Functional
'The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.': Functional
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Availability
'The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode': Functional
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual clinical sites which will include information on labs being held at that site for the given quarter (Clinical site general information on labs held at that location dates and times of all labs held there).'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Operational
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional

'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional

Now, classify the following given requirement: '100% of merchant services representatives shall be able to successfully perform a follow up action on a dispute case on the first encounter after completing the training course.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional, Availability, Fault Tolerance, Legal, Look and Feel, Maintainability, Operational, Performance, Portability, Scalability, Security, Usability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'PME Subsystem shall allow building product menus based on the list of products kept in the accounting system.': Functional
'The System shall maintain consistent security. Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.': Security
'When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.': Performance
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.': Scalability
'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.': Security
'The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.': Scalability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.': Look and Feel
'The product shall allow the user to save the property search results.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with various email servers. The product shall be able to send email.': Operational
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.': Operational
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.': Scalability
'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.': Usability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional
'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.': Performance
'All changes updates and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation': Maintainability
'Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.': Operational
'shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.': Functional
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Availability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Operational
'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.': Scalability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation': Look and Feel
'Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.': Security
'The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.': Security
The product shall be internet browser independent.The product must run using Internet Explorer and Netscape Navigator.': Maintainability
'An employee will be able to successfully use the product within a few minutes. After informally navigating the product for less than 15 minutes users shall be able to successfully setup meetings and reserve conference rooms.': Usability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional
'The System shall allow for a minimum of 6 users to work at the same time.': Performance
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.': Functional
'Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.': Performance
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional
'The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player': Security
'The product shall end a game when a hit by the offensive player results in sinking the last of the defensive player’s ships which had not been previously marked as sunk.': Functional
'The product shall synchronize contacts and appointments in an acceptable time.': Performance
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Availability
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.': Functional
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The product shall run on the existing hardware for all environments.': Operational
'The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year.': Availability
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.': Functional
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional
'Only collision estimators shall search for recycled parts. Users without the collision estimator role shall not have access to the search for recycled parts.': Security
'The application shall run on a web application server.': Operational
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Operational
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.': Functional
'The response shall be fast enough to avoid interrupting the user’s flow of thought. 90% of tasks shall complete within 5 seconds. 98% of tasks shall complete within 8 seconds.': Performance
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.': Functional
'The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.': Functional
'The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.': Functional
'The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.': Scalability
'The product shall remove players who have been inactive for 24 hours from the list of players.': Functional
'The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.': Operational
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Availability
'The leads washing functionality shall receive a period list of available reps from the enterprise system.': Functional
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Operational
'The product shall prevent a player from viewing the offensive or defensive grids of the other player.': Functional
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Availability
'The vehicle location shall include street address city state and zipcode': Functional
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional
'Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.': Functional
'The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10': Functional
'The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.': Scalability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a single student to a cohort': Functional
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Operational
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Look and Feel
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity': Look and Feel
'The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.': Functional
'The product shall free of computer viruses.': Security
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.': Functional
